alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 10 at 8:58PM PDT until May 11 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Through 11 AM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility at times and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
